channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- NetIQ Client Login Extension
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- NetIQ Client Login Extension

item.title: CVE-2024-1470|2024-08-01T18:40:21.195Z -- opentext -- netiq%20client%20login%20extension
item.description:
Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in NetIQ (OpenText) Client Login Extension on Windows allows Privilege Escalation, Code Injection.This issue
only
affects NetIQ Client Login Extension: 4.6.
